prompts: Create a fierce water-type Pokemon with long serpentine body and sharp fins.
I want to design a dragon-like Pokemon that has blue scales and white accents.
Generate a powerful Pokemon that resembles a sea serpent with a fierce expression.
Make a legendary creature with a majestic appearance and a blue and white color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in oceans, with large fins and a long, twisting body.
Show me a Pokemon with a fearsome demeanor and a beautiful aquatic design.
Give me a unique Pokemon that embodies the strength of the sea and has sharp teeth.
